question: Which of the following king entered into an alliance with Vijayanagar to besiege Ahmednagar?
explanation: During the reign of Ali Adil Shah I of Bijapur, the state ofÂ  Bijapur and Vijayanagar came very close to each other and Ali actually paid a visit to Vijayanagar City. He also entered into an alliance with Vijayanagar to besiege Ahmednagar.
